attributes.action: make it an offence carrying a maximum sentence of two years imprisonment and an unlimited fine to direct any language or gesture at a match official that is likely to cause harassment, alarm, or distress. Also create an offence carrying a maximum sentence of 10 years imprisonment and an unlimited fine to commit a common assault or threaten to commit a common assault against a match official.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Football is the countries national game and directly as well as indirectly raises a large amount of revenue for the Government.

With a Referee, there is no football game. There is no game at Old Trafford. There is no game on the local park. Without a Referee, football is nothing.

The FA say 20% of all matches are played without a qualified Referee. This is down to increased levels of abuse, both verbal and physically, aimed at Referees.

This will affect the quality of Referees in the Premiership in coming years.

Please follow the USA's lead ** and bring in laws and tough penalties specifically for people who abuse Match Officials in sports.

PROTECT THE GUARDIANS OF OUR NATIONAL GAME AT ALL LEVELS!

**= Certain States Only!
